column2: I have been imprisoned and my future looks grim, but as a woman of child-bearing age I have a possible way to get released...
column3: J'ai été emprisonné et mon futur s'annonce bien sombre, mais étant en âge d'avoir des enfants, j'ai peut-être une chance de m'en sortir...
column4: I have been imprisoned and my future looks grim, but as a woman of child-bearing age I have a possible way to get released...
column6: I have been imprisoned and my future looks grim, but as a woman of child-bearing age I have a possible way to get released...

column2: One of your prisoners, [From.GetBestName], has approached you with a request to be released from prison, and she promises to be very grateful indeed.
column3: Une de vos prisonnières, [From.GetBestName], requiert de sortir de geôle et promet d'être "reconnaissante" si vous accéder à sa demande.
column4: One of your prisoners, [From.GetBestName], has approached you with a request to be released from prison, and she promises to be very grateful indeed.
column6: One of your prisoners, [From.GetBestName], has approached you with a request to be released from prison, and she promises to be very grateful indeed.

column2: After a night of guilty pleasures you are released, a free woman once more.
column3: Après une nuit de plaisirs coupables vous êtes libérée, encore une femme libre.
column4: After a night of guilty pleasures you are released, a free woman once more.
column6: After a night of guilty pleasures you are released, a free woman once more.

column2: Your request to be released has been denied.
column4: Your request to be released has been denied.
column6: Your request to be released has been denied.

column3: Jouer le jeu de la séduction.

column2: I'll release her into my bedchamber tonight...
column3: Je vais l'inviter dans ma chambre cette nuit...
column4: I'll release her into my bedchamber tonight...
column6: I'll release her into my bedchamber tonight...

column3: Espérons qu'il n'y aura pas de "conséquences" ...

column2: No, such an action would be sinful.
column3: Non, une telle action serait pécheresse.
column4: No, such an action would be sinful.
column6: No, such an action would be sinful.

column3: Je ne me laisserai pas séduire !

column2: You try to seduce your way to freedom.
column3: Vous essayer de préparer votre chemin vers la liberté via la séduction.
column4: You try to seduce your way to freedom.
column6: You try to seduce your way to freedom.

column2: You join [From.GetBestName] into his bed before you are freed.
column3: You join [From.GetBestName] into his bed before you are freed.
column4: You join [From.GetBestName] into his bed before you are freed.
column6: You join [From.GetBestName] into his bed before you are freed.

column2: I am growing older and have no heir, maybe it is time I acknowledge one of my illegitimate children...

column4: I am growing older and have no heir, maybe it is time I acknowledge one of my illegitimate children...
column6: I am growing older and have no heir, maybe it is time I acknowledge one of my illegitimate children...
